I do the same things every day.
I get up at seven in the morning.
I get ready to go to work, and go to work on an overcrowded subway.
Then I start my boring work routine, check emails,...
...attend meetings, and answer calls, and so on.
That's pretty much the same for most office workers.
You could do something fun after work.
By the time I get off work, I just want to go home and rest.
